Writing Track

Handwriting

Goal: Write numbers legibly.

Materials: Attached Document (coming soon!)

1st Challenge: Fill a Spot with a Number

Fill each spot with a number. Completed if: Each number is legible. Otherwise, follow up with: Pick 1 number to practice writing. (Be creative. Chalk, markers, paint, anything counts.)

2nd Challenge: Fill a Spot with a Different Number

Fill each spot with a different number. Same completion/follow up.

When both challenges are finished, move to next Writing Task.
